AI Description: netCDF-C++4 is a C++ interface for netCDF4, which is a software library and file format for storing multidimensional scientific data. It provides an object-oriented programming interface to the netCDF library, allowing users to read and write data stored in netCDF format using C++.
Core Features: Provides A C++ Interface For Netcdf4, Allows Reading & Writing Of Multidimensional Scientific Data, Supports Object-Oriented Programming Approach, Enables Manipulation Of Data Stored In Netcdf Format
General Tags: Netcdf, C++ Interface, Scientific Data Storage
